title: Sunil appointed to Board of Northern Province Tourism Bureau
body_lines: Sunil Dissanayake, a veteran in the leisure Industry and human resources management has been appointed to the Board of Management of the Northern Province Tourism Bureau by the Northern Province Governor Jeevan Thiagarajah.

Sunil is currently Director/CEO of the Bandaranaike National Memorial Foundation (BMICH - International Convention Centre). Previously he has worked in multiple roles at SriLankan Airlines, Hayleys PLC, The Kingsbury Hotel, Carson Cumberbatch PLC, Ramada Hotel, Dubai, Galadari Meridian Hotel, John Keells Holdings and Ceylon Hotels Corporation among others.
